# Setup

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
```

```{r}
housing_labels_2020 <- load_variables(year = 2020,
               "dhc",
               cache = TRUE)
```

```{r}
ca_ny <- get_acs(geography = "county", 
              variables = c(medincome = "B19013_001"), 
              state = c("CA", "NY"), 
              year = 2021) %>% 
    separate(NAME, 
           sep = "\\, ",
           into = c("county", "state"))

```
